named-query.name: Landen.findAll
named-query.query: select l from Landen l order by l.naam

named-query.name: Soorten.findAllOfLand
named-query.query: select s from Soorten s where landid = :land order by s.naam

named-query.name: Wijnen.findAllOfSoort
named-query.query: select w from Wijnen w where soortid = :soort order by w.jaar
